title: Peak eSports Academy Team
body:
Hey everyone, 

My name is Jesse "Mickey" Clemmons, I am the owner for Peak eSports [www.peakesports.com](http://www.peakesports.com/) we are making a team that is going to be our academy team and we will have a strict practice schedule, coaches/analysts for you and a manger for you. This team has the goal in mind to make it to the Challenger level. 

With that said if you are plat+ then we want you, there will be a one week tryout period, where we will make sure you have the right attitude and that you fit in with the team, we will be doing what we can as an organisation to support the team with a full support staff.

our current roster is

**Top - Needed **
**Jungle - Needed**
**Middle - Needed**
**AD Carry - Peak Savage**
**Support - Needed**

***Please copy and past this in the comments and fill it out***

IGN:

Rank:

Name:

Top 5 Champs:

Experience:

Working Mic?:

Teamspeak?:

Availability:

Thanks for reading and can't wait to meet you all

Mickey

replies.body: Looking for more supports and junglers to tryout!

IGN: No Parallels

Rank: gold 4 last season, promos right now

Top 5 Champs: Orianna Katarina Kennen Syndra Yasuo Etc

Working Mic?: yes

Teamspeak?: yes

Availability: busy on friday night but other then that and the rare magic tournament im pretty flexible.

Hi , my name is Tyronne

Age : 20.

Rank : Was plat1 diamond series , tilted to plat 5 .

Position : Mid Lane

Champ pool : Anivia , Ahri , Liss , Zed , Yasuo , Ezreal , Jayce.

I Am a Very Aggressive player. I like to work with the jungler and counter jungle with deep wards. Call my missings, when Enemy is out of lane i go straight to pushing getting that tower down. i Like to roam alot , getting easy kills . Dueling is my strongest quality in this game as of Callouts. My Ability to learn a champion , Give me 5 or 6 normal games and it will be done so. my mechanical Skills as of dodging skill shots are mainly why i play this game.

When i play a game i want to be the best at it and i think playing with you guys would be a good adding to my knowledge and skills.

Highest ranked team i got to was diamond 3 level in Ranked 5's

I've won several tournaments NGG and Destiny Falls , 2 Go4Lol Wins in 2011 , Nothing too serious but i like to put it on my resume.

Btw if i have grammar errors it's most likely because i'm french but my english is very fluent .

My availlabilitys are Everyday All Week. 24/7.

I Hope you guys take this into consideration because i am very serious about this application.

Thank you

-Tyronne
